column5: Got the chance to do some fall smallie fishing with my father in law on one of my favorite lakes in the Grey-Bruce area.  Had to get the kids on the bus, so didn't get on the water until after 9.  Still managed 8 nice bass.  I was up 6-0 on my FIL until he nailed an absolute monster bass....didn't have a scale but it was a good, honest 5 pounder.  Just a hawg.  I managed a few nice ones too in the 2-3 pound range.  All caught on senkos, drop shots, or blade runners.
Not sure why the pics are sideways.  They are rightside up on my computer....
Nice fish , hope to get out this week and enjoy the extended summer myself
Nice tank smallie !!!! They fight insane in the colder water !!!!! Cheers !!!!!!
Can't complain with a day like that! Good stuff.
Nice guys, smallmouth are almost a new favourite for me! So much fun,  Thanks for sharing!  MTBF
nice fish..................ive always wanted to do some serius bass fising
nice fish..................ive always wanted to do some serius bass fising   You can. The credit is full of them.  Nice fish. Smallies rock.
not where i live i live in brampton mississauga rd and queen they are near the marsh
